_header: O Piers Plowman just is thy life
_description: Praise of Piers Plowman for living by his labour, written in margin beside description of agricultural work in Aristotle’s Rhetoric

CamPeter57.Transcription:
O pers plwman iust is thi lifeThw livist of thi labour with owt ani
                    strife
CamPeter57.Note:
In right margin, and repeated in lower margin, both by a hand of early
                    fifteenth century.
